thread.title: Cavuto Slams Media’s ‘Over-The-Top Negativity’ In Covering Trump
thread.title_full: Cavuto Slams Media’s ‘Over-The-Top Negativity’ In Covering Trump

author: Jack Davis
title: Cavuto Slams Media’s ‘Over-The-Top Negativity’ In Covering Trump
text:
Nancy Pelosi ‘Willing To Listen’ To Trump, But On Her Terms 
Cavuto noted that during the weeks after Trump’s election when stock markets rose due to the anticipated impact of Trump’s policies, the news media never connected Trump with the Wall Street’s success. However, he noted, when the markets dipped after the failure of Obamacare overhaul last week, it was labeled the “Trump slump” by one media organization. 
He also noted that CNN carried an opinion piece with the headline, “Is Trump Already a Lame Duck President?” 
“Who comes up with this quack?” Cavuto said. “Where is the balance in that? Where is the fairness in that?” Advertisement - story continues below 
“Remember, I have no axe to grind, but the media sure does when it comes to saying anything good about this president,” he added. 
Cavuto’s Monday comments came on top of a rebuke he delivered last week, noting, “hell hath no fury like a mainstream media still furious at a president who calls them fake.” 
“They seize on virtues they say the president lacks, but their own reporting lacks even more,” he added. 
Cavuto had three questions for the news media. Advertisement - story continues below
